column5: Located on wooded 18 ac. Los Patios campus on Salado Creek. Built sq. ft. 10' ceilings, full kitchen, Jacuzzi, outdoor fireplace, media room, laundry. Adjacent to 20+ mile Salado Greenway (hike/bike). Includes four lunch vouchers at LP. Our residence is a no-smoking zone. Guests who smoke are welcome do so in outdoor spaces only.
